fields.name: new_order_admin
fields.subject: Order placed

fields.name: return_order
fields.subject: The bag was returned
fields.content:
Bag {{ order.luggage.title }} {{ order.luggage.luggage_size.title }} {{ order.luggage.luggage_wheels.title }} {{ order.luggage.luggage_class.title }} was returned.
thanks for using luggary! 
See you soon again!

fields.name: new_order_user
fields.subject: New order confirmation

fields.name: remind_return
fields.subject: Remind for your luggage
fields.content:
Hi!

Just a reminder that tomorrow is your return date for  {{ order.luggage.title }} {{ order.luggage.luggage_size.title }} {{ order.luggage.luggage_wheels.title }} {{ order.luggage.luggage_class.title }} cnt: {{ order.cnt }}.

thanks for using luggary!

fields.name: remind_invoice
fields.subject: You have unpaid invoice for luggary.com
fields.content:
Hi!

Just a reminder that have an unpaid invoice for ${{ invoice.amount}} at Luggary.com.

thanks for using luggary!
